test = int(raw_input())

def palin(N):
    if len(N) < 2:
        return True
    if N[0] == N[-1]:
        return palin(N[1:-1])
    return False

def rev(N):
    ans = ''
    for i in N:
        ans = i + ans
    return ans

for i in range(test):
    num = raw_input()
    count = 0
    while(not palin(num)):
        num = str(int(num) + int(rev(num)))
        count += 1
    print count, num
